title: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Removal

body.body: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Removal
Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Removal seat, battery, fuel tank DB4; DBB; DT4; DTB; DTC; DU4; DUB; DUC

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DBB; DUC; DTB; DUB; DTC; DU4; DT4; DB4

body.body: Locate and disconnect the wheel speed sensor electrical connector from the main harness and from the connector bracket under the fuel tank.
Front wheel speed sensor electrical connector
Note the routing of the wheel speed sensor harness and its clips for installation.
Detach the front ABS wheel speed sensor harness from the clips on the front brake line.
There is a shim between the wheel speed sensor and the front fork leg.
Release the fixing securing the wheel speed sensor to the fork leg.
Remove the wheel speed sensor and collect the shim.

body.name: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor cjes_2

search: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Removal
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Perform the following operations:
Seat - Removal
Battery - Removal
Fuel Tank - Removal
Locate and disconnect the wheel speed sensor electrical connector from the main harness and from the connector bracket under the fuel tank.
Front wheel speed sensor electrical connector
Twist grip electrical connector
Front brake switch electrical connector
Note the routing of the wheel speed sensor harness and its clips for installation.
Detach the front ABS wheel speed sensor harness from the clips on the front brake line.
There is a shim between the wheel speed sensor and the front fork leg.
Release the fixing securing the wheel speed sensor to the fork leg.
Remove the wheel speed sensor and collect the shim.
Fixing
Clip
Front ABS wheel speed sensor
